summary:
*Sailor Moon* is a popular Japanese manga and anime series created by Naoko Takeuchi. The story follows Usagi Tsukino, a schoolgirl who transforms into the superhero Sailor Moon. She searches for the Legendary Silver Crystal and fights with her friends, the Sailor Guardians, to save the Solar System from evil.

The manga was published in Japan from 1991 to 1997 and adapted into an anime series, movies, and a live-action show. It has been very successful, with over 46 million manga copies sold worldwide and $2.5 billion in merchandise sales. Fans love it for its fun art, interesting characters, and funny moments.
title: Sailor Moon
